dr.evolution.colouring
Class DefaultBranchColouring

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.colouring.DefaultBranchColouring
All Implemented Interfaces:
BranchColouring
public class DefaultBranchColouring
extends java.lang.Object
implements BranchColouring

BranchColouring.java Represents a colouring on a single branch, both backward and forward in time.

Version:
$Id: BranchColouring.java,v 1.6 2006/08/12 12:55:44 gerton Exp $
Author:
Gerton Lunter, Andrew Rambaut
